oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Export Opportunities in French Organic Market
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Oosterkamp, Elsje
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The market for organic products is growing in France. This offer opportunities for Dutch exports. Exports already exists, but is still limited. In a study considered whether and how their Dutch suppliers access to the French market can increase.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Oosterkamp, Elsje (2011) Export Opportunities in French Organic Market. bioKennis, http://edepot.wur.nl/193441.
